headings: Student Development and Leadership in Higher Education M.Ed.
Prepare for a career in higher education leadership in the non-academic areas of college campuses.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
M.Ed. in Student Development and Leadership in Higher Education
What Can You Do With a Student Development and Leadership in Higher Education Degree?
Why Earn My Student Development and Leadership in Higher Education Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our nationally-ranked program can be completed 100% online in as quickly as one year. You will receive multiple learning opportunities, providing you with a high level of ability to integrate all aspects of your life (family, career, academics, personal time, etc.) on your own schedule, determined by you. And, you don’t have to wait until after graduation to apply what you learn - the modules, assignments, activities and communication provide you with tools you can immediately apply to your world of work.

Our award-winning faculty stress personal contact and advising. You have tremendous exposure to broad and deep learning opportunities with our faculty, who have diverse academic, educational and professional backgrounds.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
The increasingly high expectations of college students for additional and exceptional services are creating a greater need for contemporary leaders in the non-academic arenas of higher education.

Our graduates can expect to find career opportunities in a variety of settings, from community colleges and research universities to military and community organizations, or to advance into a doctoral program.

Earn yourAcademic Advising Certificatewhile working towards your degree. Earning your certificate can help start or advance your career as an academic advisor on college or university campuses. You only need five courses to earn your certificate, and those credits also apply towards your M.Ed. degree here at Angelo State.

Our program offers multiple opportunities for you to engage with your faculty and peers. Through coursework, like group activities, interviewing professionals and practitioners in the field, immersing yourself in other cultures, and consistent communication, you will form strong connections with others, allowing you to develop a professional network.

Our students are able to discover new perceptions and  viewpoints alongside peer students at many different types of institutions around the world, including public, private, two-year, four-year, research and liberal arts institutions, as well as Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCU).

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
